Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, good location”
Reviews.Author: berikaSweden
Reviews.Content: Perfect location for everything, friendly and helpful staff, good breakfast. We 3 are very satisfied what we got for the money we payed and will for sure come back

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT IGNORE BAD REVIEWS-AWFUL HOTEL!”
Reviews.Author: anna f
Reviews.Content: I stayed here last month and the poor reviews on here are correct. The hotel is dark, smelly and dirty. It is occupied by injured Lybian people who have no respect at all for anyone else. The staff are just as bad-they ignore the guests, hardly smile and allow the Lybian occupants to run riot. The breakfast is barely edible-i managed some bread which was stale. We had countless issues with our room key breaking so we were locked out. The walls a paper thin and a nearby club will keep you awake most of the night due to noise. AVOID!

Reviews.Title: “CLOSE TO LIFE”
Reviews.Author: GreeceDiana
Reviews.Content: i stayed there for 4 days in the begginig of march the hotel is very clean very near to taxim square only 5 minute on foot realy full breakfast you can find many many things to eat quit big rooms quite hotel the only problem is one lift for each wing

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Havana, Ciudad de la Habana, Cuba
Reviews.Title: “A review that shows the truth- READ IT”
Reviews.Author: Elisavet G
Reviews.Content: This hotel sucks! The pictures are not related to reality! I stayed in a triple room and the one bed was a cot that looked like a grave. Although there were 3 beds there were 2 towels and no toilet paper(we had to ask for it). Chewing gums were stuck on the floor and there was no soap as in other 4 star hotels. Breakfast was disgusting. If you're european you won't be able to touch it. The only acceptable dish was some kind of pie with chocolate, but because it's the only tasty you can find there, it finishes immediately, so if you're thinking of having your breakfast at 8 thirty or so you won't find it. There were also some creepy/ perverts from Libya who touched the girls and tried to abuse us. Don't go there. The only positive thing is that it's close to Taksim square and the prices are logical. OH! Staff didn't even speak english. And the mini bar is totally empty. Not even some water.

Reviews.Title: “Very good”
Reviews.Author: Dianne E
Reviews.Content: Stayed here the first week from january 2012,. 2 minutes from Taksimsquare, and the best shoppingstreet of Istanbul. Very lively area to spend the evening. Breakfast was great, a buffet meters long with something for every one. Staff was very friendly and helpfull. We recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “ABSOLUTELY FINE”
Reviews.Author: Grampasauras
Reviews.Content: Large clean room with comfortable beds, plenty of hot water, handy for public transport, huge choice at breakfast, reception friendly and helpful enough.............. Not much of a view from the room but can't have everything?!?

Reviews.Title: “Standard hotel nothing exciting”
Reviews.Author: TouringTrick
Reviews.Content: I spent one night here and it was fine, nothing exciting. The staff were not overly impressive except for the bellboy who should be working at the worlds best hotel, he was completely on it. The reception desk service was terrible to begin with but improved considerably towards the end of my stay. If you are a non smoker, make sure you get a non smoking room or you will feel like you are personally being fumigated. Breakfast was mediocre by Turkish Standards. On the plus side, the hotel is centrally located in a safe area with perfect access to public transport and nightspots. I would put this at an upper 3 star status

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel to stay”
Reviews.Author: LilaTses
Reviews.Content: The positives : Very good and safe location, 2-3 mins walk to Taksim Square, spacious and clean rooms, plasma tv, spacious and clean bathrooms with new towels and all kind of toiletries (They changed the towels everyday), wireless internet at the lobby. The negatives : Very poor breakfast, far from an intercontintal one, tough (for me) mattress. When checking our they tried to charge us items from the minibar.

Reviews.Title: “We'll never be back”
Reviews.Author: GhadaS0liman
Reviews.Content: Rooms are dull, smells like big bathroom, poor ventilation and almost no airconditioning, convenient location but so does the 1000 surrounding hotels, poor breakfast. Do not go there

Reviews.Title: “Defiantly not recommended”
Reviews.Author: Sheiko
Reviews.Content: I'm currently staying at the hotel the location is great 2 min away from Taksim square with a lot of small restaurants and cafes in the area. The room are small and dark, bathroom has a sink issue and some dripping, breakfast sucks and the stuff are really horrible.

Reviews.Title: “There should be better places very near”
Reviews.Author: afranski
Reviews.Content: By reading the reviews I thought the situation has improved since last year, and therefore expected much better than what I saw. The photos have been taken with the wide lens. Rooms are much smaller. The overall hotel vision photo has been modified by something like photoshop.... Breakfast was very poor for a 4 star hotel. Reception generally cold and un helpful. The corridors stinked , like basements. Overall not something to try again.

Reviews.Title: “VERY GOOD CHOICE FOR ISTANBUL”
Reviews.Author: matilda253
Reviews.Content: Hotel is situated close to Taksim square, is recently renovated, clean rooms, rich breakfast five minutes walk from the famous Istaklal street. Suggest for both individual and families also.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: Vdawar
Reviews.Content: Location of the Hotel is very good. Taxism square is a very Happening place. You can find people enjoying even at midnight. Hotel Premises are neat and clean. Staff is very helpful and professional. Almost everything is available near the hotel. Overall I was satisfied staying in the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Carooo97
Reviews.Content: This hotel was SUPPOSED to be a four star hotel, yet it was a piece of rubbish with a bunch of lies. The pictures on the website were nothing like the hotel itself. The staff does not smile and the receptionist looked like a piece of dry fish, and would not talk to us unless he wanted to scam us. The smell of the lobby and hallways was enough to turn your stomach upside down. It smells like sewage mixed with airplane food. Ohhh! and the view.. . DON"T EVEN GET ME STARTED! I had a beautiful view of the Bosphorus... NOT! More like the view of dirty men looking into our room while smoking. The "BEAUTIFUL" view also had loud fans. They were so loud that you couldn't hear anything when the windows were open. The walls were so thin, you could here the conversations of the people next door. The walls were all ripped and the lighting in the hallways and rooms were horrible. The lighting in the hallways was so bad that you could barely see anything. The washrooms were disgusting. There was black scum in the bathtub which would fill up so quickly during a five minute shower because it would not drain. The hotel barely provided toilet paper and towels. The only way you could get a couple was if you continued asking the staff. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL TO ANYBODY, THIS TWO STAR HOTEL IS NOTHING LIKE THE FOUR STAR IT IS SUPPOSED TO BE!

Reviews.Title: “clean with good location”
Reviews.Author: gardoo
Reviews.Content: this hotel has very good location 5 min walk to taksim and istiklal street .very close to metro taksim station.indoor and out door swimming pool.everey day room cleaning and make up beds .air condition work properly.breakfast good .

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel I have ever stayed in my life”
Reviews.Author: Mohamedoraby25
Reviews.Content: the bathroom is leaking everywhere in the room, and AC not working

Reviews.Title: “very nice, actually....”
Reviews.Author: Knarz
Reviews.Content: We had a very different experience to the other reviewers here. We spent our christmas holidays here, and staff, room, service and price were very decent. Free internet in the room, comfortable beds (even the blankets were long enough for tall people), everything worked fine and was clean, friendly concierges... The area is very convenient, you're 2 minutes walking from Taksim square and the Istiklal shopping area. Walking to Sultanahmet takes about 45 minutes. Food around the clock in the area. We never took the breakfast (too early for us :-)) so we don't know about that, but everything else was really good. We found these reviews after booking and paying, and feared the worst, but we had a very good time here and everything was fine. We can recommend the place.

Reviews.Title: “Don't do it!”
Reviews.Author: intervallo
Reviews.Content: I am actually living in Istanbul but my partner came to visit and we stayed in this hotel.They lied to my partner that there was a gym here, the staff we rude constantly, they gave us two singles instead of a double and the beds were from the 60's. Everything was hilleriously over priced and as for their panaramic view of the bospohrus...uh no, yet more lies. When I greated the staff in Turkish they looked at me like I was insulting their loved ones! And the so called "free" hamam...hmm no 20euros for half and hour!!! Bar this time every single time I come to Istanbul (that's alot) I stay in the same hotel which is 1/4 of the price, in a much better location with the friendliest staff who can't do enough for you and make you feel like family. So if you want to come to Istanbul stay at the Hotel Agan in Sirkici - ! It has better beds and deccor that than the "four" star Golden Age 1, the staff don't treat you like dirt and it will make your stay here 100000 times better!

Reviews.Title: “Good Location & Value for money”
Reviews.Author: narora2
Reviews.Content: Good Location and very near to tourist centre .Food quality is also good, very large room size, and good service, Bad: language with room service staff is a barrier, Vegetarian and indian food availability is a concern area for Indian tourist

Reviews.Title: “Don't even consider coming to this hotel”
Reviews.Author: msavic
Reviews.Content: I am sitting in the lobby of this awful hotel right now, and dreading going back to my room. Upon my arrival I changed rooms twice in hope I'd get a better one, but all was in vain. In the first room lights didn't work and it was so dirty. There was hair all over in the bathroom and the toilet was so dirty that I didn't even want to use it. I asked for another room and when I finally got it I had a similar problem, phone didn't work, dirty sheets, toilet flush didn't work and lights were broken. I don't know how I'm gonna stay here for the next 4 days. It is so terrible, and staff is so unfriendly. I had to technicians come to my room who tried fixing my phone. They sat on my bed in their dirty suits. It was gross. Also, the rooms are so dark. My room looks at a wall of another building, which is so close that if I stretch my arm far enough I can touch the other building. Terrible experience, please don't come here ever!!!

Reviews.Title: “Extremly negative”
Reviews.Author: BirdyJoeHoaks
Reviews.Content: Just don't go there. All the plumbing screams for replacement. Breakfast is just awful - outright rotten vegetables (tea is passable). Simple plumbing fix took 4 days (I reminded them twice a day). Small and dirty room, tobacco smoke smell everywhere. The only positive impression - sauna, hamam and massage. These were good, the staff was kind and professional.

Reviews.Title: “horrible disgasting place”
Reviews.Author: recommender
Reviews.Content: stay away from this terrible hotel. we were there in June 2007 in the middle of summer but we never saw A/C works. Front desk people are rude and not helping. aweful rooms, dirty. Horrible breakfast service. you never can find something eatable. very dark and nasty hotel. bad area. you can never have a rest in this hotel. It's in a busy , bad area. never ever go to this place. please stay away. it's not descriable !

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: Shafu
Reviews.Content: WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL. We were booked into this hotel by our tour company. The front desk clerk was extremly rude. While checking in, he made it very clear to me that I had to wait while he was checking in walk-in people. The reason was simple, the hotel already had our money as it was part of our tour stay. Other individuals were walk-in clients. He wanted their money. We waited almost 30 min, before getting to our room. It was very frustrating. The following day, we asked the same clerk where we could find a taxi or if he could call us a taxi. He answered by saying "No" he wasn't going to call a taxi and he didn't know where we could find one. We complained to the hotel manager. He assured us that, the front desk supervisor would contact us to discuss our issue. Nobody followed up with us. We complained to our tour company. The following day we received a plate of fruits. Not an apology. The situation got wrost from there on. We had better help from the clerk of a store infront of a hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away!”
Reviews.Author: asuko
Reviews.Content: The worst 4 star hotel we ever took. No hot water! â€“ We got hot water only during some hours of the day. The room was filed up with smoke, located on a disco that rock 3 nights a week (so no sleep). The only way we could refresh the room when opening the window and having the smoke from the chimneys come in to the room. Bathe room falling apart and rusty. The spa is a joke â€“ and they try to charge for it separately. Only one good thing â€“ location.

HotelInfo.Name: Golden Age 1 Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Topcu Cad No 22 | Taksim, Istanbul 80090, Turkey
